name: AWD Holding
overview: AWD Holding AG, along with its subsidiaries, provides individual financial advice and planning services in Europe. It focuses on provision of hedge fund and old-age pension products, and long-term growth of assets. The company provides retirement provision services; and private asset accumulation and asset retirement planning services for private customers. It serves customers in Germany, Austria, Czech Republic, Hungary, Poland, Slovakia, Great Britain, and Switzerland. AWD Holding AG was formerly known as Allgemeiner Wirtschaftsdienst. The company was founded in 1988 and is based in Hanover, Germany. It has independent representative offices in Germany, the United Kingdom, Austria, Switzerland, and Central and Eastern Europe. AWD Holding AG operates as a subsidiary of Swiss Life Deutschland Holding GmbH.
